credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
dimensions: H x W: 30.5 x 26cm (12 x 10 1/4in.) framed dimensions
title: Virtue Paying Homage at the Tomb of Washington
provenance: Ex. colll. Fraser/Martin. Written on back of frame: American. Lord and Taylor. Dining Room. 75 (dollars)
medium:
Medium: silk, paint
Technique: embroidered on plain weave foundation; some painted details
description: Embroidered picture showing Virtue in the figure of a young woman in classical dress scattering flowers on the tomb of George Washington shaded by a large tree. Embroidered in silks, with the exception of the face, arms and feet, which are painted. Framed and glazed with black mat and title painted on the glass.
name: Embroidered picture
